EmailTemplate.description: QN Package Corian® Quality Network - EN Version
EmailTemplate.name: BI-EMEA QN Package EN
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to the Quality Network of DuPont CORIAN® !
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Quality Network Member,
Welcome to the Quality Network of DuPont™ Corian®!
Having completed the requirements and demonstrated your proficiency in the fabrication and installation of DuPont™ Corian® products, you are now entitled to place your Quality Network Number ({!Qualification__c.Reference_Id__c) on invoices of installations as carrying the 10-year limited installed warranty from DuPont.
We hereby gladly send you the link with pdf-files which you can download. This link contains the list with documents:
* Your signed contract with your quality network number {!Qualification__c.Reference_Id__c} of {!Qualification__c.Last_Contract_Date__c} * Your quality network certificate * The DuPont™ Corian® abridged fabrication booklet, the installation booklet * Our spec data, which can also be found on www.corian.com * Use & Care guidelines (PDF-file) * Free telephone numbers of the warranty department * Recommendation of use of adhesives * Technical bulletin of Illumination Series * Technical bulletin on Stone Series * Technical bulletin on Excel-Ray * Technical bulletin on Metallix colours * Technical bulletin on Lustra colours * Quality Network brochure * The DuPont™ Corian® fabrication manual
A package of 50 Use & Care brochures will be sent by separate mail.
We are proud to have you as a member of our DuPont™ Corian® Quality Network team and wish you continued success for the future.
Sincerely,
{!Qualification__c.Owner__c} DuPont Building Innovations – Surfaces Quality Network Assistant Warranty Centre Corian® Email: BI-Warranty@dupont.com www.corian.com
